home.seoTitle: Join us for an unforgettable boutique festival
home.seoDescription: Experience music, art, and good vibes in a stunning natural setting.
home.rsvpSeoDescription: Ready to join the fun? RSVP to secure your spot at our festival!
home.welcome: Welcome to our *boutique festival* â€” your getaway for great times and new friends!
home.introduction: Soon, we'll open the gates to a magical gathering in a cozy village where music, laughter, and community come alive. We can't wait to have you with us!
home.openMap: Explore the festival location on Google Maps

schedule.header: Join us for a weekend full of experiences
schedule.description: The festival starts midday with welcome performances, followed by food, music, and late-night celebrations.

when.question: When is the festival?
when.answer: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Expect a weekend packed with fun, dates to be revealed soon.

where.question: Where is it happening?
where.answer: In a beautiful rural property surrounded by nature and open skies, perfect for relaxing and celebration.
where.description: Enjoy wide open spaces, trails, and cozy corners designed for mingling and music, all nestled in serene countryside.

how.question: How do I get there?
how.answer: The venue is a short drive from the nearest city. We recommend renting a car for the most flexible travel experience.

rsvp.question: How do I RSVP?
rsvp.answer: Simply let us know if you're coming and how many will join you. We can't wait to celebrate together!

what-sleep.question: Can I stay overnight?
what-sleep.answer: Absolutely! There are limited spaces available for camping and cozy cabins. Book early to secure your spot.

what-eat.question: What about food and drinks?
what-eat.answer: We have delicious food trucks and local vendors throughout the festival. Bring your appetite!

what-wear.question: What should I wear?
what-wear.answer: Dress comfortably and express your unique style. Expect outdoor festival vibesâ€”think layers, comfy shoes, and a splash of color.

gifts.question: Can I contribute or help?
gifts.answer: If you'd like to support the festival, contributions are welcome via {paypal}. Contact us for details.
gifts.answer-1: Or reach out to see how you can lend a hand behind the scenes.

cannot-attend.question: What if I canâ€™t make it?
cannot-attend.answer: Weâ€™ll miss you, but no worries! Stay tuned for future events and community gatherings.

helping.question: How can I help out?
helping.answer: We love volunteers! Whether itâ€™s setup, welcoming guests, or creative workshops, reach out and weâ€™ll find a spot for you.

more.question: Got more questions?
more.answer: Drop us a line anytime! We're here to help make your festival experience amazing.

invite.intro: Weâ€™re thrilled youâ€™ll be joining us at our boutique festival! Hereâ€™s some info to help you get ready for the weekend ahead:

travel.title: Travel and Transportation
travel.text: The {venue} is a tranquil retreat surrounded by nature. The closest airport is {airport}, approximately a {driveDistance} away. Car rental is encouraged for ease and exploration.

meals.title: Food and Drink
meals.text: Enjoy a variety of local food vendors and food trucks throughout the festival. Bring your appetite and your friends!

reception.title: Main Stage & Gatherings
reception.text: Join us for live performances, open mic sessions, and communal gatherings to celebrate art and music.

packing.title: What to Bring
packing.text: Here are some essentials for your festival experience:
list: Comfortable clothes for day and night.
Sturdy shoes for walking and dancing.
Swimwear and towel for nearby natural spots.
Reusable water bottle to stay hydrated.
Your favorite festival gear and positive vibes!

gifts.title: Support and Contributions
gifts.text: If youâ€™d like to support the festival, please consider contributing via {paypal}. Thank you for helping us keep the spirit alive!
